name: Toggle
description: A two-state button that can be either on or off. Commonly used for formatting controls and settings

props.name: pressed
props.description: The controlled pressed state of the toggle

props.name: onPressedChange
props.description: Event handler called when the pressed state changes

props.name: variant
props.description: The visual variant of the toggle

props.name: children
props.description: React.ReactNode content for the toggle. Write JSX directly, without a function wrapper.

author: UI Components Team
